articles.title: Stack Overflow's copy / paste keyboard now comes with RGB - The Verge
articles.description: Drop and Stack Overflow are releasing a followup to The Key, their keyboard dedicated to copying and pasting. The Key V2 features hot-swappable switches and RGB lighting.
articles.content:
Millions of colors. Three keys.
If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.
Now with hot-swappable switches and RGB.
